t: What Is Amazon Family? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Family allows you to easily manage all your shared services, subscriptions, and digital content from one place. t: Create Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can create an Amazon Family to share Prime benefits and a Family Library with another adult, up to four teens (who were added before April 7, 2025), and up to four children.

t: Share Amazon Prime with Your Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to set up an Amazon Prime family account and share your benefits with your family members.

t: How to use Amazon Family to manage digital content and share select Prime benefits with your family members
s: March 7, 2025 - Amazon Family makes it easy for customers to manage and share services, subscriptions, and digital content, all in one place.

t: Share digital content with your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: How to share digital content and apps, like Kindle ebooks, Prime Video shows, Music, and games with your Amazon Family by using Family Library.

t: Remove an Adult from Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can remove an adult profile from your Amazon Family in Manage Your Amazon Family.

t: Add an Adult to an Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Family requires a unique Amazon account for each adult.

t: Amazon.com: My Family, Mi Familia : Movies & TV
s: I love the story a Mexican-American family celebrating their joys and enduring their sorrows trying to live the American Dream.
